scripts.db:reset: supabase db reset && supabase gen types typescript --local > supabase/database.types.ts
scripts.sync-schema: export $(grep -v '^#' .env | grep PROD_SUPABASE_CONNECTION_STRING | xargs) && supabase db push --db-url "$PROD_SUPABASE_CONNECTION_STRING"
scripts.sync-to-prod: npm run sync-schema && npm run sync-data-and-storage
